description: Amatsu-Mikaboshi  is a fictional character in the Marvel Comics Universe, a supervillain and demonic god of evil who is best known as an enemy of Hercules and Thor. He is based on the Mikaboshi of Japanese mythology and the gods of Japan known as Kami.
name: Mikaboshi
powers: Opening of temporary apertures between twilight realms & ability to traverse dimensions instantly
Power to absorb & enslave anything & anyone into void
